Max takes $100 to a sporting goods store to buy baseball pants.

He buys two pairs of baseball pants that each cost $29.99.

How much money does Max have left?

Expression Simplified Form Does it work? Ideas
\(a. 100 -(29.99 -29.99)\)
\(b. 100 -(29.99 + 29.99)\)
\(c. 100 -29.99 -29.99\)
\(d. 100 -2(29.99)\)
